mapper.insert: insert into crew_welcome_tb (crew_id, user_id, content) values ( #{crewId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT cw.crew_welcome_id, cw.crew_id, cw.user_id, cw.content, cw.created_at, ut.nickname, ut.birth_date, ut.full_name, row_number() over (partition by cw.crew_id order by cw.created_at desc) as welcome_rank from crew_welcome_tb cw left outer join user_tb ut on (cw.user_id = ut.user_id) where cw.crew_id = #{crewId}
